Quantitative Systems Biology 2019 (October 28th and 29th)
Location Programme Speakers Talks Poster

There are opportunities for participants to give a talk or a poster. Please indicate on the registration form if you wish to do so. We will review all applications and notify you of any outcome of your applications, by the end of Friday 19th October 2019 (for talks) or Wednesday 24th October 2019 (for posters).

Refreshments and lunch will be provided on the day as indicated on the schedule. Unfortunately we cannot provide any support for travel arrangements, thus, participants should organise any travel and accommodation required to attend the workshop themselves.

Quantitative Systems Biology 2019 (October 28th and 29th)

  • The QSB Organising Committee
  • qsbw@outlook.com

QSB2019 - student-led workshop, 28th - 29th October 2019, Strand Campus, King's College London.
